title: Erzsi Somogyi
data: Erzsi Somogyi (1906–1973) was a Hungarian stage and film actress.[1][2] She was born in Transylvania in what subsequently became Romania after the First World War. She was active on the stage in Budapest for many decades, while also making film appearances. She was married to the actors János Pásztor and the writer Béla Gádor.
